AAE.caption: Format type
AAE.doc: The format to use for the input
AAE.name: formatType

AAF.caption: Input ID
AAF.doc: The ID of the Input element to format. You must add an ID to your input first. In your project settings, make sure "Expose the option to add an ID to HTML elements" is enabled. Then add your ID in your Input's properties.
AAF.name: inputID

AAG.caption: Delimiter(s)
AAG.doc: Delimiter to use. For multiple delimiters, split with /,/
AAG.name: delimiter

AAI.caption: Prefix
AAI.doc: Add a prefix to your input
AAI.name: prefix

AAK.caption: Date Format
AAK.doc: The format to use for Date inputs. m for month, d for days, y for years (2 figures), Y for years (4 figures)
AAK.name: dateformat

AAN.caption: Initial Content (Unformatted)
AAN.doc: If you need to set a default value to the input that is raw (not preformatted), you should add it here instead of in the Input element's properties.
AAN.name: rawdefaultvalue

AAJ.caption: Unformatted Input
AAJ.doc: Returns the input string without formatting
AAJ.name: rawinput

AAO.caption: Unformatted Input (As Number)
AAO.doc: Returns the input string without formatting as a number
AAO.name: rawinputnumber
